column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Now I understand that things happen
column2: but we had 10 people expecting a dinner... who were in town from all over... expecting Cafe Ba-Ba-Reebas service. We've heard great reviews from multiple Chicago locals
column3: only to get there with no notice of a restaurant shut down. Not a call
column4: not an open table update. NOTHING.  We waited until till 10 pm to eat dinner for no reason. In the area
column5: no place is open much later than that
column6: aka we had 10 hungry people with no place to eat.
